original_text: And he made fifty taches of gold, and coupled the curtains one unto another with the taches: so it became one tabernacle.
korean_text: 금 갈고리 쉰 개를 만들어 그 갈고리로 두 휘장을 연결하여 한 막을 이루었더라

sentences.original_text: And he made fifty taches of gold
and coupled the curtains one unto another with the taches
